title: Dump this feedback tab!
text: It's too bright, users can't close or move it.  Do you really want the most arresting visual on your site to be an annoying advertisement for another company??

title: Find workaround for resizing not working on Chrome/Opera/IE7
text: Some modern browsers apply the "don't allow resizing of a window that's not opened by this window" security policy to the window.resizeTo method. One workaround could be to popup a new window, with given dimensions.

title: Add Silverlight to plugin detection
text: Microsoft Silverlight should be included in the plugin check at whatsmy.browsersize.com

title: Offer bookmarklets for each browser size
text: I'd like to set up bookmarklets for my Bookmarks toolbar.  It would be nice if each button was a bookmarkable link.

title: setmy.browsersize.com/<width>x<height>
text: This feature is temporarily taken offline due to some glitches that arose after the introduction of the popup workaround.

title: Investigate setting browser size not working on IE7
text: There have been numerous reports that setmy.browsersize.com is not working for IE7 for some people.

title: Add sparklines to stats to show historic trends
text: Sparklines next to screen resolution stats to show historic trends going back a year

title: Show viewport size at whatsmy.browsersize.com
text: Add info about the usable area (viewport) inside the browser, maximized on these screen dimensions on different platforms.

title: Global Stats are for screen size. What about browser size?
text: Everyone says people have wide screens so we should make websites wider, but what if no ones browser is wide?
